Html:
Hello,

I'm working on a project that involves exporting CSV files, PDF files and XLS (or XLSX) files. I have a problem with the export XLS, XSLX files. Indeed, when I want to read my file, I have an error. My file would have no good format or the good extension.

Would anybody have had the same problem?

 

Thank you for your answer.
Sorry for my English which is not to be perfect.
